R

randomMovement() - Method in class dkeep.logic.MovementStrategy
Function of random movement; This is used when MovingAgent movement is random;
recoverFromStun() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Ogre
Function to change status of stun; It will decrease number of left rounds to be stunned every time that is called; Change the symbol of Ogre is he recover totally of stun;
replaceStairs() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Configs
Function to replace all Stairs to Doors;
resetLevel() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Game
Function to reset completely the game; This first prepare the configuration to this level; After will get the information of the start conditions of the game on config and set all to the game;
resize(int, int) - Static method in class dkeep.logic.maps.KeepMap
Function to resize the map; Will resize the map maintaining the data of the map;
responseHandler(MovingAgent, int, Point) - Method in class dkeep.logic.Game
Function that handle with the response of GameMap.isFree() after move one MovingAgent; If return of GameMap.isFree() is: .. 0 - Out of Map, the position of MovingAgent is reset to the previously; .. 1 - Free Space, verify if took the key or enables the lever and if stun the Ogre; .. 2 - Stairs, verify if the MovingAgent is Hero to with the game; .. 3 - Door, verify if the MovingAgent have the key to Open the door;
reverseDirection(char) - Method in class dkeep.logic.MovementStrategy
Function that swap direction of movement; EX: If movement is to right the return to left;
Rookie - Class in dkeep.logic
Derived class from Guard This guard moves in a different style
Rookie(Point) - Constructor for class dkeep.logic.Rookie
Constructor of Rookie; Initialize Rookie and set your's start position;
ROOKIESYMBOL - Variable in class dkeep.logic.Rookie
Constant char that contains the symbol of MovingAgent
roundsStunned - Variable in class dkeep.logic.Ogre
Value that contains the number of rounds that remains to the ogre to get out of stun
